body:
Hi Abraham,
I don't know how I missed that, no air condition no cooling loads... duh! anyways, thanks for the help. I agree that it's better to divide the building into multiple zones. I'm going to create 6 zones for this building.
Oh, by the way thanks for the tip about fixing the components that turn orange (w/warning) it saved me a lot of time. For some reason whenever I close the file and re-open it some components give me warning, so I tried your suggestion, it works great.

Rania
